type.description: Specify the canvas type, support 2D and WebGL
type.description_zh: 指定 canvas 类型，支持 2d 和 webgl

canvasId.description: The unique identifier of the canvas component, which does not need to be specified if type is specified
canvasId.description_zh: canvas 组件的唯一标识符，若指定了 type 则无需再指定该属性

disableScroll.description: When moving in the canvas and there is a bound gesture event, screen scrolling and pull-down refresh are disabled
disableScroll.description_zh: 当在 canvas 中移动时且有绑定手势事件时，禁止屏幕滚动以及下拉刷新

id.description: Component unique identifier. Note: IDs in the same page cannot be duplicated.
id.description_zh: 组件唯一标识符。注意：同一页面中的 id 不可重复。

nativeProps.description: Used to transparently transfer properties on WebComponents to internal H5 labels
nativeProps.description_zh: 用于透传 WebComponents 上的属性到内部 H5 标签上

onTouchCancel.description: Finger touching action is interrupted, such as incoming call reminders, pop-up windows
onTouchCancel.description_zh: 手指触摸动作被打断，如来电提醒，弹窗

onLongTap.description: Triggers after 500ms of finger press, and moving after triggering a long press event will not trigger the scrolling of the screen
onLongTap.description_zh: 手指长按 500ms 之后触发，触发了长按事件后进行移动不会触发屏幕的滚动

onError.description: 当发生错误时触发 error 事件，detail = {errMsg: 'something wrong'}
onError.description_zh: 当发生错误时触发 error 事件，detail = {errMsg: 'something wrong'}

onReady.description: The canvas component initialization is triggered successfully.
onReady.description_zh: canvas 组件初始化成功触发。
